idatha enkulu: Iiseti zedatha ezinkulu kakhulu ukuba zisetyenzwe ngokwesintu
ukufunda koomatshini: Ii-algorithms ezivumela iikhompyuter ukuba zifunde kwidatha
i-cryptography: Ubuchwephesha bonxibelelwano olukhuselekileyo kunye nokukhuselwa kwedatha
kukubhadla okungeyonyani: Yenza ukuba oomatshini babonise ukuziphatha okukrelekrele
ukusebenzisana kwabantu kwikhompyuter: Uphononongo lwendlela abantu abanxibelelana ngayo netekhnoloji
ukusetyenzwa kolwimi lwendalo: Iikhompyutha ziqonda kwaye zisetyenzwa ngolwimi lwabantu
icomputing enxuseneyo: Ukusebenzisa iiprosesa ezininzi ngaxeshanye ukusombulula iingxaki
ubunjineli besoftware: Inkqubo yokuyila, ukwakha, kunye nokugcinwa kwesoftware
uphuhliso lwewebhu: Ukwakha nokugcina iiwebhusayithi kunye nosetyenziso lwewebhu
uphuhliso olusemva: Ingqiqo yecala leseva kunye nolawulo lwedatha yewebhusayithi
umbono wekhompyuter: Ukuvumela iikhompyuter ukuba 'zibone' kwaye ziqonde ulwazi olubonakalayo
intanethi yezinto: Uthungelwano lwezixhobo eziphathekayo ezinezakhono zekhompyutha ezizinzisiweyo
